sentence: Other Republican candidates in the race include state Sen. Doug Mastriano, a combat veteran who has sought to campaign as a supporter of Trump.
author: Kate Scanlon
title: Pennsylvania GOP gubernatorial candidates vie to show strongest fealty to Trump

sentence: There is no one in Pennsylvania who has done more, or fought harder, for Election Integrity than State Senator Doug Mastriano,? Trump said in a statement issued through his Save America PAC, before echoing a baseless claim about the 2020 presidential election results.
author: Caroline Vakil
title: Trump endorses Doug Mastriano for Pennsylvania governor

sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. Doug Mastriano won the Republican nomination for Pennsylvania governor on Tuesday, beating eight other candidates and a party establishment that had tried to head off his nomination over fears that he is too extreme to win the general election in the presidential battleground.
title: Trump-backed Mastriano wins GOP Pennsylvania governor nod

sentence: On Saturday, former President Trump announced his endorsement of state Sen. Doug Mastriano.
author: Maureen Breslin
title: Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate Josh Shapiro tests positive for COVID-19

sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) Doug Mastriano won the Republican nomination for Pennsylvania governor on Tuesday, beating eight other candidates and a party establishment that had tried to head off his nomination over fears that he is too extreme to win the general election in the presidential battleground.
author: Associated Press
title: Trump pick Doug Mastriano wins Pennsylvania GOP primary
